summary: Adds Ifrit from the Final Fantasy Series as a summon.
descriptionHtml:
[size=6]MOD IS PROVIDED AS IS[/size]


Adds Ifrit from the Final Fantasy Series as a summon.
Spell Tome can be found on Ifrit himself at Arcwind Point to the southeast of Helgen and Southwest of Ivarstead.
He is seriously OP and can use Fire Breath and Unrelenting Force. He knows almost all Fire spells including Fire Storm and Flame Cloak. *He has yet to use Fire Storm in testing* He also carries a uniquely named Daedric Warhammer called "Hellfire" which does 30 points fire damage.
Good Luck beating him.


Upcoming Stuff: Shiva, Ramuh, Odin and Buhamut summons. Possibly a quest to connect them.
author: Mercer Leonhart
